attributes.action: Introduce measures for Lighter Evenings by introducing Single Double Summer Time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Not only will lighter evenings allow for more social and sporting activities for your children, but it has been shown that having lighter evening will be safer, with a reduction in accidents and fatalities on the roads.  

This change would make the country a safer place, with more usable time for the majority out-side of work and reduce the impact of seasonal affective disorder (SAD).
